Nova dimenzija praÄ‡enja borbi

Spajanje AI tehnologije i adrenalina

OsnivaÄ platforme, Stefan PopoviÄ‡, istakao je da je cilj partnerstva modernizacija pristupa sportskim podacima na Balkanu.

"Spajanje AI tehnologije i adrenalina koji nosi BIF je prirodan korak napred. NaÅ¡ sistem koristi napredne matematiÄke modele kako bi ljubiteljima sporta pruÅ¾io precizne informacije koje su ranije bile dostupne samo profesionalnim analitiÄarima."

- Stefan PopoviÄ‡, osnivaÄ Correct Score Pro

Besplatne analize i prognoze

Svi posetioci BIF dogaÄ‘aja moÄ‡i Ä‡e da prate analize i besplatne prognoze putem:

  • ZvaniÄnog sajta correctscore.pro

Ovo partnerstvo predstavlja znaÄajan korak u modernizaciji borilaÄkih sportova na Balkanu i donosi revolucionarni pristup sportskoj analitici.
content_en:
A New Dimension in Fight Tracking

BELGRADE â€“ The Balkan Influence Fighting (BIF) organization proudly announces a strategic partnership with Correct Score Pro, a leader in AI-based sports analytics.

This collaboration brings a new dimension to fight tracking, where Correct Score Pro algorithms will analyze data and provide deep insights into fighter performance.

Merging AI Technology and Adrenaline

Platform founder Stefan PopoviÄ‡ emphasized that the partnership aims to modernize the approach to sports data in the Balkans.

"Merging AI technology with the adrenaline that BIF brings is a natural step forward. Our system uses advanced mathematical models to provide sports fans with precise information that was previously available only to professional analysts."

- Stefan PopoviÄ‡, founder of Correct Score Pro

Free Analyses and Predictions

All BIF event visitors will be able to follow analyses and free predictions via:

  • The official website correctscore.pro
  • The free Telegram channel t.me/cspro787

This partnership represents a significant step in modernizing combat sports in the Balkans and brings a revolutionary approach to sports analytics.

Zaboravite na stare borbe. Zaboravite na dosadne prenose i generiÄke likove. BIF â€” Balkan Influence Fighting dolazi da razbije Å¡ablone i postavi nove standarde zabave na Balkanu.

Mi nismo klasiÄna borilaÄka organizacija. Mi smo pokret.

BIF je spoj dve najveÄ‡e strasti danaÅ¡njice â€” influensa i borbe. Zamislite najzvuÄnija imena sa TikToka, YouTube-a i Instagrama â€” lica koja svakodnevno gledate na ekranu â€” kako ulaze u ring. Bez filtera. Bez skripte. Samo oni, publika i istina.

"Mi nismo klasiÄna borilaÄka organizacija. Mi smo pokret."
- BIF Manifesto

Å ta je BIF?

NaÅ¡ cilj nije da proizvodimo samo borbe. NaÅ¡ cilj je da stvaramo priÄe, rivalitete, momentume koji pale druÅ¡tvene mreÅ¾e, pune hale i bude adrenalin. BIF borci su stvarni ljudi sa stvarnim konfliktima, a publika postaje deo svakog udarca, svakog pogleda i svake pobede.

Nova realnost

Zamislite najzvuÄnija imena sa TikToka, YouTube-a i Instagrama â€” lica koja svakodnevno gledate na ekranu â€” kako ulaze u ring. Bez filtera. Bez skripte. Samo oni, publika i istina.

BIF borci su stvarni ljudi sa stvarnim konfliktima, a publika postaje deo svakog udarca, svakog pogleda i svake pobede.

Jednom kad uÄ‘eÅ¡ u BIF svet, viÅ¡e nema izlaska.

content_en:
BIF - Revolution in Combat Sports

Forget old fights. Forget boring broadcasts and generic characters. BIF â€” Balkan Influence Fighting comes to break the mold and set new entertainment standards in the Balkans.

We are not a classic fighting organization. We are a movement.

BIF is a fusion of today's two greatest passions â€” influence and fighting. Imagine the biggest names from TikTok, YouTube and Instagram â€” faces you see on screen every day â€” entering the ring. No filters. No script. Just them, the audience and the truth.

"We are not a classic fighting organization. We are a movement."
- BIF Manifesto

What is BIF?

Our goal is not just to produce fights. Our goal is to create stories, rivalries, moments that ignite social media, fill arenas and fuel adrenaline. BIF fighters are real people with real conflicts, and the audience becomes part of every punch, every look and every victory.

New Reality

Imagine the biggest names from TikTok, YouTube and Instagram â€” faces you see on screen every day â€” entering the ring. No filters. No script. Just them, the audience and the truth.

BIF fighters are real people with real conflicts, and the audience becomes part of every punch, every look and every victory.

Once you enter the BIF world, there's no way out.

Welcome to the new reality. Welcome to BIF.

ViÅ¡e od dogaÄ‘aja

content_en:
BIF 0 - First Step in the Revolution

July 2025. Remember that month. Because that's when it all begins.

BIF 0 is our first step, but also an announcement of everything to follow. It's not the main spectacle yet â€” but it's the fireworks that announce it.

In this event, we will present our vision, our team, philosophy, and most importantly â€” our first fighters.

What to Expect?

Expect:

  • Exclusive faces from social media that you've never seen in this light
  • Personal stories, rivalries and reasons why they're entering the ring
  • Interview shows, "face to face" confrontations, first face-off moments

"BIF 0 is not an ordinary event â€” it's the presentation of a movement."

More Than an Event

BIF 0 is not an ordinary event â€” it's the presentation of a movement.

It will be an evening when the Balkans stop being just spectators... and become the arena.

This is an invitation. Not to an event, but to a revolution.

BIF 1 - War of Worlds Begins

And now... what we're doing all this for.

BIF 1 is the big canvas where we put the biggest Balkan influencers â€” in the craziest, most expensive and most viral event in regional internet history. It's held in a large hall, in front of thousands of people live and hundreds of thousands of viewers online.

This isn't a "fight night".

Rivalries that have been smoldering for years now come before cameras, spotlights and audiences.

Imagine...

Imagine:

Explosion

BIF 1 is not just a "sequel". It's an explosion.

Either you're part of it...
...or you're just watching while the BALKANS BURN.

Balkan Influence Fighting proudly announces BIF 15, an event that will mark this year in the world of mixed martial arts in the Balkans. This spectacular tournament will be held on June 15, 2025 at Štark Arena, where the best regional fighters will face each other in the fight for titles and glory. Main Fights of the Evening The evening's program will open with several exciting matches in different categories, and the climax will be the fight for the lightweight champion title between the current champion Marko BojkoviÄ‡ and challenger Francisco Barrio. "This will be the biggest event in BIF's history. We have prepared an unforgettable night for all MMA fans." - BIF Organization Director Tickets on Sale Tickets for BIF 15 are already on sale at the following prices: VIP sector: 15,000 RSD Premium: 8,000 RSD Standard: 4,500 RSD Student: 2,500 RSD The arena is expected to be completely sold out, so we recommend purchasing tickets as soon as possible. Live Broadcast For all those who will not be able to attend live, BIF 15 will be broadcast live on our YouTube channel, as well as on partner television stations throughout the region.
